Package shared.communication

This package contains code that is required for the client and server to communicate.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    authToken
    An authToken is used to tell a client whether a server operation was able to continue or not, based on provided user credentials.
    batchBlob
    a batchBlob contains a batch which is being sent from a server to a client.
    batchProposal
    a batchProposal is the means whereby clients attempt to submit indexed batches to the server
    fieldList
    fieldLists are containers for fields, which are sent from the server to the client as a response to a request for fields
    projList
    projLists are sent from the server to the client as a response to a request to list projects which are available for indexing
    searchBlob
    searchBlobs contains ONE result of a keyword search in the records which have been indexed
    searchProposal
    searchProposals are the means by which the client asks the server to perform a keyword search in the records of the database
    userToken
    a userToken encapsulates the user data relevant to authentication; it keeps the password and username secret during transmission from client to server, and the server can only check if a username/password combination is correct; the password submitted is hidden from the server.

Package shared.communication Description

This package contains code that is required for the client and server to communicate. Request and reply encapsulations (tokens and blobs) live here.
